00027 class SysSocket : public SysSocketBase
00028 {
00029     friend class SocketRxThread;
00030     friend class DataConn;
00031 
00032     public:
00033         class FdSet : public fd_set {
00034             public:
00035                 FdSet() { Reset(); }
00036 
00037                 BOOLEAN TestFor(const SysSocket &s) const { return FD_ISSET(s.GetHdl(), this); }
00038                 void Add(const SysSocket &s) { FD_SET(s.GetHdl(), this); }
00039                 void Remove(const SysSocket &s) { FD_CLR(s.GetHdl(), this); }
00040                 void Reset() { FD_ZERO(this); }
00041 
00042                 FdSet& operator=(const FdSet &fds) {
00043                     memcpy((fd_set *) this, &(const fd_set &) fds, sizeof(fd_set));
00044                     return *this;
00045                 }
00046         };
00047 
00048         typedef int SocketHdl;
00049 
00050         enum Type {
00051             c_type_dgram = SOCK_DGRAM,
00052             c_type_stream = SOCK_STREAM,
00053             c_type_raw = SOCK_RAW
00054         };
00055 
00056         enum AddrFamily {
00057             c_addr_family_inet = AF_INET,
00058             c_addr_family_unspec = AF_UNSPEC
00059         };
00060 
00061         enum {
00062             c_pref_stack_size = 3000            // preferred stack size for SocketRxThread
00063         };
00064 
00065         typedef int Protocol;
00066 
00067         SysSocket(SocketHdl socket = -1);
00068 
00069         BOOLEAN IsValid() const { return m_socket != -1; }
00070         SocketHdl GetHdl() const { return m_socket; }
00071 
00072         static SocketHdl GetInvalidHdl() { return -1; }
00073 
00074         BOOLEAN Init(INT af, INT type, INT protocol);
00075         INT Close();
00076 
00077         BOOLEAN Accept(SysSocket *s, InetSocketAddr *peer);
00078         INT Bind(const InetSocketAddr &addr);
00079         INT Connect(const InetSocketAddr &peer);
00080 
00081         INT Listen(INT backlog) { return listen(m_socket, backlog); }
00082         INT Recv(void *buf, INT buflen, INT flags) { return recv(m_socket, (CHAR *) buf, buflen, flags); }
00083         INT RecvFrom(void *buf, INT buflen, INT flags, InetSocketAddr &peer);
00084 
00085         INT Send(const void *buf, INT buflen, INT flags) { return send(m_socket, (CHAR *) buf, buflen, flags); }
00086         INT SendTo(const void *buf, INT buflen, INT flags, const InetSocketAddr &peer);
00087 
00088         INT Shutdown(INT how) { return shutdown(m_socket, how); }
00089 
00090         INT GetLocal(InetSocketAddr &local);
00091         INT GetPeer(InetSocketAddr &peer);
00092 
00093         INT GetInBufByteCount(UINT &arg) { return ioctl(m_socket, FIONREAD, &arg); }
00094 
00095         INT GetOption(OptionType type, INT &val);
00096         INT SetOption(OptionType type, INT val);
00097         
00098         SocketError GetSysError();
00099 
00100     private:
00101         SocketHdl m_socket;
00102 
00103         static INT Select(SysSocket::FdSet &readfds, SysSocket::FdSet &writefds, const Ticks *t_timeout = 0);
00104         static INT SignalSelect();
00105 
00106         static SocketError MapSysErrorCode(INT err);
00107         static BOOLEAN MapOptionType(SysSocket::OptionType type, INT &so_level, INT &so_type);
00108 
00109         static INT SystemInit() { return 0; }
00110         static INT PppConnSetup(BOOLEAN serial, const CHAR *account, const CHAR *pwd, PppConnSetupDone callback) {
00111             callback(0);
00112             return 0;
00113         };
00114         static INT PppStop(PppConnSetupDone callback) {
00115             callback(0);
00116             return 0;
00117         };
00118         static INT PsdLinkUp(const UINT8 nsapi, BOOLEAN ackmode, UINT32 ipaddr) {
00119             return 0;
00120         };
00121         static INT PsdLinkDown(const UINT8 nsapi) {
00122             return 0;
00123         };
